modules.name: hjp-assign-consultant-to-new-deal-01.module
modules.purpose: Start page for consultant/approver intake; surfaces consultant metadata and approver requirements from WF-01 outputs.

modules.name: hjp-assign-consultant-to-new-deal-02.module
modules.purpose: Collects consultant assignment confirmation and exposes the approver selection instructions.

modules.name: hjp-assign-consultant-to-new-deal-03.module
modules.purpose: Final confirmation view; links to the Create/Associate Well experience and reiterates approver conflict checks.

forms.name: Consultant Assignment Form
forms.purpose: Collects consultant + deal IDs, triggering WF-06 to create association type 4 while keeping approver distinct.

workflows.name: 01. Update Recruiting Deal
workflows.purpose: Populates consultant metadata, generates assignment URLs, and guards against consultants doubling as approvers.

workflows.name: 03. Update Sales Deal & Create Custom Project Object
workflows.purpose: Validation gate that requires an Approver-labelled contact before the deal can remain Closed Won.

workflows.name: 06. Associate Consultant to a New Sales Deal
workflows.purpose: Creates the consultant association after the assignment form submits and double-checks for approver conflicts.
